name: touch
text:
Touch, touch, touch, touch, touch
Thought about you way too much, much, much, much, much
Over, over thinking us, us, us, us, us
'Cause you been so out of touch
You could have had my love
But you been so out of touch
Monday I was dreaming bout ya
Tuesday I was waiting near the phone
Two days, wasn't hearing from ya
Yea, what can I say?
Oh, baby, I was getting bored
Thursday I was losing interest
Friday you were out there in the cold
Weekend you already missed it
I was moving on ('cause you were moving too slow)
Sometimes I'm alone
Stare out my window
And the moon makes you seem close tonight
But you been so out of touch, touch, touch, touch, touch
Thought about you way too much, much, much, much, much
Over over thinking us, us, us, us, us
'Cause you been so out of touch
You could have had my love
But you been so out of touch, touch, touch, touch, touch
Thought about you way too much, much, much, much, much
Yea, you went it messed it up, up, up, up, up
'Cause you been so out of touch
You could have had my love
But you been so out of touch
First you're gonna say you're sorry
Promise you won't do it anymore
Come up with a different story
Yea, what can I say?
Say something I ain't heard before
I'm too fun to waste my time
Too young to waste one night
So here comes, some good advice
If I ever call again
Don't press ignore
'Cause sometimes I'm alone
Stare out my window
And the moon makes you seem close tonight
But you been so out of touch, touch, touch, touch, touch
Thought about you way too much, much, much, much, much
Over, over thinking us, us, us, us, us
'Cause you been so out of touch
You could have had my love
But you been so out of touch, touch, touch, touch, touch
Thought about you way too much, much, much, much, much
Yea, you went it messed it up, up, up, up, up
'Cause you been so out of touch
You could have had my love
But you been so out of touch

translatedLines.T0: Touch, touch, touch, touch, touch
translatedLines.C0: Please translate the surrounding context (CX) into Korean.
translatedLines.G0: 이 문장은 'Touch'라는 단어가 다섯 번 반복되어 있습니다. 이는 어떤 행동이나 감각을 강조하거나 지속적으로 느끼는 것을 표현합니다. 전체적으로 강렬하고 반복적인 접촉을 의미합니다.
translatedLines.I0: tʌtʃ, tʌtʃ, tʌtʃ, tʌtʃ, tʌtʃ
translatedLines.R0: 터치, 터치, 터치, 터치, 터치

LI.E1: 물리적인 접촉을 의미하는 동사입니다. 여기서는 반복적으로 사용되어 강렬한 접촉을 강조합니다.
LI.XE: She reached out to touch the fabric.
LI.XI: ʃi riːtʃt aʊt tə tʌtʃ ðə ˈfæbrɪk
LI.XR: 쉬 리치트 아웃 투 터치 더 패브릭

LI.E1: 앞의 단어를 반복하여 강조하는 용법입니다.

LI.XR: 히 펠트 어 젠틀 터치 온 히즈 숄더

LI.E1: 세 번째 반복으로, 감각의 지속성을 더욱 강조합니다.
LI.XE: The artist's touch brought the painting to life.
LI.XI: ði ˈɑːrtɪsts tʌtʃ brɔːt ðə ˈpeɪntɪŋ tə laɪf
LI.XR: 디 아티스츠 터치 브로트 더 페인팅 투 라이프

LI.E1: 네 번째 반복으로, 접촉의 강도를 더욱 강조합니다.
LI.XE: Her touch was warm and comforting.

LI.E1: 다섯 번째 반복으로, 접촉의 지속성을 최종적으로 강조합니다.

translatedLines.T0: 'Cause sometimes I'm alone
translatedLines.C0: 무시하지 마세요. 가끔씩 나는 혼자이니까요.
translatedLines.G0: 이 문장은 이유를 나타내는 접속사 'because'의 축약형인 'cause'로 시작합니다. 'sometimes'는 시간의 부사어로 '때때로'를 의미하며, 'I'm alone'은 주어(I) + 동사(am) + 보어(alone)로 구성되어 있습니다. 전체적으로 화자가 가끔씩 혼자임을 표현하는 문장입니다.
translatedLines.I0: kəz ˈsʌmtaɪmz aɪm əˈloʊn
translatedLines.R0: 커즈 섬타임즈 아이엄 얼론

LI.E1: 'because'의 축약형으로, 이유를 나타내는 접속사입니다.
특정한 사건이 반복적으로 일어나지만 항상은 아닐 때를 나타내는 부사입니다.
'I am'의 축약형으로, 주어와 동사를 결합한 형태입니다.
다른 사람과 함께 있지 않거나, 외로움을 느끼는 상태를 나타내는 형용사입니다.

translatedLines.O0: 'Cause sometimes I'm alone

translatedLines.T0: If I ever call again
